description:
Power On and Off WebOS LG TVs together with your PC.

This application (UI and service) controls LG WebOS TVs and displays.
New and improved:
- Native ARM64 for Windows build - thanks @Amrsatrio
- User Idle Mode now works properly with Steam Input and with better tolerance of jittery controllers
- Improved automatic HDMI-input switching
Bugfixes
- Optimised workqueues
- Fixes to occasionally failed websocket connections and persistence
- Other minor fixes
